text: White Dog is a 1982 American drama movie. It is about a white dog that is trained to attack black people. Kristy McNichol plays Julie Sawyer, Paul Winfield plays Keys, and Burl Ives plays Carruthers. The movie was very controversial for its racial themes. Paramount Pictures didn't release it for a long time because of concern for negative press. It was finally released uncut in the United States in December 2008. The movie received very good reviews from critics. == Other websites == * * * Category:1982 thriller movies Category:1982 drama movies Category:American thriller movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies about dogs Category:Movies about racism Category:Movies about animal cruelty Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies composed by Ennio Morricone Category:Movies directed by Samuel Fuller Category:Paramount Pictures movies
title: White Dog
